#8 - Real Estate: How The Wassermans Do What They Do

My First Million
14 Aug 2019
We have on Gelena (@gelenasays) & Keith Wasserman (@Keith_Wasserman), a husband and wife Real Estate duo who borrowed $5k during the end of the 2008 recession and have turned it into a $1.3 billion dollar portfolio. Learn how they create monthly income streams and sometimes double, triple or quadruple their equity from multi-family real estate.Â  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
